subject: Football
Assaults
Coaches and Managers
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Bills put Kromer, their offensive line coach, on indefinite paid leave two days after he was arrested on suspicion of punching and threatening a boy.
snippet: The Buffalo Bills put Kromer, their offensive line coach, on indefinite paid leave two days after he was arrested on suspicion of punching and threatening a boy.
